SELECT u.id, u.nickname AS userName, u.email, u.create_time AS createTime, ( IF ( u.`status`, '有效', '禁止登陆' ) ) AS state, u.last_login_time AS lastLoginTime FROM sys_user AS u WHERE (1=1)
AND u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dto.keyword},'%')

SELECT usr.id, usr.nickname, usr.pswd, usr.`status`, ur.rid, r.`name` AS roleName FROM sys_user AS usr LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON usr.id = ur.uid INNER JOIN sys_role AS r ON ur.rid = r.id WHERE usr.pswd = #{pass} AND usr.nickname = #{name}
